4.3.6 Party B retains the right to adjust the public price of the service and the service content, including but not limited to adding or reducing the service items, and raising or lowering the prices. In the event that Party B wishes to carry on such adjustment, it shall notify Party A in writing two weeks in advance. If Party A objects to such adjustment, it has the right to notify Party B to terminate this Agreement in writing within 2 weeks upon receipt of the notification.
